Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® LOCI® Thyroid Stimulating Hormone Flex® reagent cartridge (TSHL)
Dimension® LOCI® Free Thyroxine Flex® reagent cartridge (FT4L)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension® EXL™ integrated chemistry system with LOCI® Module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension LOCI Thyroid Stimulating Hormone and Free Thyroxine Flex reagent cartridges using chemiluminescent immunoassay for thyroid disease diagnosis on Dimension EXL systems
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) and free thyroxine (FT4) in human serum and plasma to aid in the diagnosis and monitoring of thyroid disease using the Dimension EXL integrated chemistry system with LOCI Module
